Returns: The options to be used for shadow, overlay and rounded corner.
createShadowOverlayOptions().Description: Create ShadowOverlayHelper Options. Subclass may override. e.g. return new ShadowOverlayHelper.Options().roundedCornerRadius(10);

areChildRoundedCornersEnabled().Description: Returns true if rounded corners are enabled for children of this row.

getNumberOfColumns().Description: Returns the number of columns in the vertical grid.

createGridViewHolder(android.view.ViewGr.Description: Subclass may override this to inflate a different layout.

isUsingZOrder(android.content.Context).Description: Returns true if SDK >= L, where Z shadow is enabled so that Z order is enabled on each child of vertical grid. If subclass returns false in isUsingDefaultShadow() and does not use Z-shadow on SDK >= L, it should override isUsingZOrder() return false.

enableChildRoundedCorners(boolean).Description: Enables or disabled rounded corners on children of this row. Supported on Android SDK >= L.

isUsingDefaultShadow().Description: Default implementation returns true if SDK version >= 21, shadow (either static or z-order based) will be applied to each individual child of @B_android#support#v17#leanback#widget#VerticalGridView_E@. Subclass may return false to disable default implementation of shadow and provide its own.

getFocusZoomFactor().Description: Returns the zoom factor used for focus highlighting.

setNumberOfColumns(int).Description: Sets the number of columns in the vertical grid.

getShadowEnabled().Description: Returns true if child shadow is enabled. This is not only for enable/disable default shadow implementation but also subclass must respect this flag.

Parameters: int: Controls the zoom factor used when an item view is focused. One of @B_android#support#v17#leanback#widget#FocusHighlight#ZOOM_FACTOR_NONE_E@, @B_android#support#v17#leanback#widget#FocusHighlight#ZOOM_FACTOR_SMALL_E@, @B_android#support#v17#leanback#widget#FocusHighlight#ZOOM_FACTOR_XSMALL_E@, @B_android#support#v17#leanback#widget#FocusHighlight#ZOOM_FACTOR_MEDIUM_E@, @B_android#support#v17#leanback#widget#FocusHighlight#ZOOM_FACTOR_LARGE_E@ enabled dimming on focus.
VerticalGridPresenter(int).Description: Constructs a VerticalGridPresenter with the given parameters.

isUsingZOrder().Description: Returns true if SDK >= L, where Z shadow is enabled so that Z order is enabled on each child of vertical grid. If subclass returns false in isUsingDefaultShadow() and does not use Z-shadow on SDK >= L, it should override isUsingZOrder() return false.

Parameters: int: Controls the zoom factor used when an item view is focused. One of @B_android#support#v17#leanback#widget#FocusHighlight#ZOOM_FACTOR_NONE_E@, @B_android#support#v17#leanback#widget#FocusHighlight#ZOOM_FACTOR_SMALL_E@, @B_android#support#v17#leanback#widget#FocusHighlight#ZOOM_FACTOR_XSMALL_E@, @B_android#support#v17#leanback#widget#FocusHighlight#ZOOM_FACTOR_MEDIUM_E@, @B_android#support#v17#leanback#widget#FocusHighlight#ZOOM_FACTOR_LARGE_E@
boolean: determines if the FocusHighlighter will use the dimmer
VerticalGridPresenter(int, boolean).Description: Constructs a VerticalGridPresenter with the given parameters.

Returns: True if keeps foreground of child of this grid.
getKeepChildForeground().Description: Returns true if keeps foreground of child of this grid, the foreground will not be used for overlay color. Default value is true.

VerticalGridPresenter().Description: Constructs a VerticalGridPresenter with defaults. Uses @B_android#support#v17#leanback#widget#FocusHighlight#ZOOM_FACTOR_MEDIUM_E@ for focus zooming and enabled dimming on focus.

isFocusDimmerUsed().Description: Returns true if the focus dimmer is used for focus highlighting; false otherwise.

setShadowEnabled(boolean).Description: Enable or disable child shadow. This is not only for enable/disable default shadow implementation but also subclass must respect this flag.

Parameters: boolean: True if keep foreground of child of this grid.
setKeepChildForeground(boolean).Description: Set if keeps foreground of child of this grid, the foreground will not be used for overlay color. Default value is true.

ClassDesc: A presenter that renders objects in a @B_android#support#v17#leanback#widget#VerticalGridView_E@.
